modal.title: GET THE APP, AND GET ON THE WAITLIST
modal.text: When this drops, you’re going to be right there to catch it. Plus, we’ll plant a tree just for you. Really.
modal.textAbove: Instant spending notifications across all your payment cards

bottomSide.textBig: Lanistar Ltd is a registered EMD agent (FRN: 902996) of Modulr FS Limited and may distribute and redeem e-money and provide payment services. Modulr FS Limited is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority ('FCA') under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900573) for the issuing of electronic money and to provide payment services. Lanistar Limited ('Lanistar') is currently only carrying out pre-launch marketing in preparation for a future launch of Lanistar branded payment cards ('Cards'). Lanistar is finalising arrangements with various partner firms who are authorised and/or regulated (by the FCA and other overseas regulators) and the Cards will only be launched and go-live when those arrangements are in place.

sectionHero.textHero: A polymorphic payment card for those who know influence is the only currency that matters.
sectionHero.text2026: GET THE APP TO GET ON THE WAITLIST.

sectionCredit.title: PAYMENT CARD
listingPay: Instant spending notifications across all your payment cards

sectionSecurity.text: The most secure payment card in the world. Load up to 8 payment cards and get one-time PINs straight from the keypad
listingIcons: Nlitz on-line shopping more securely with dynamic CVV2
You control your money, it doesn’t control you

cards.heading: SEND MONEY FOR FREE
cards.text: Lanistar to Lanistar payments are free, so there’s no reason not to settle up.

cards.heading: SPLIT BILLS
cards.text: Send, request and split money with anyone, anywhere instantly. And if they’re using Lanistar, you know it’s free as anything.

cards.heading: TRACK YOUR SPENDING
cards.text: See and track your spending across all your payment cards in real-time. And if you want instant notifications when money comes in or out, we’ve got that too.

cards.heading: 24/7 MULTI-LINGUAL SUPPORT
cards.text: Need us? We’re up. 24/7 multilingual support, in-app or on WhatsApp. You’re in control.

cards.heading: STACK, SWAP, DON'T STOP
cards.text: One payment card per account? Yeah no. Our payment cards are polymorphic, meaning you can stack multiple cards in one, and swap between.
